title: The weird correlation between the Super Bowl and the stock market - Yahoo Finance
content: The weird correlation between the Super Bowl and the stock market  Yahoo Finance
description:
A good day for the offenses in this yearâ€™s Super Bowl could mean a good year for the stock market is in store, according to new data from S&P Global Market Intelligence.

Super Bowls in which the final combined score was higher than 45 points, the stock market returns 15.9% on average, while returns average only 8.2% when the combined score is 45 or less.
